channel.title: Spot on Cinema
channel.itunes:subtitle: Weekly movie news and trivia based on CinemaSpot resources.
channel.itunes:author: CinemaSpot.com Editor
channel.itunes:summary: Spot on Cinema is a weekly show covering the latest movie releases and their reviews, along with the newest DVDs, Hollywood news and trivia.
channel.description: Spot on Cinema is a weekly show covering the latest movie releases and their reviews, along with the newest DVDs, Hollywood news and trivia in about three minutes.

item.title: April 3
item.itunes:author: CinemaSpot.com Editor
item.itunes:subtitle: Movie news of the week - CinemaSpot.com
item.itunes:summary: Leatherheads and Shine A Light open on the big screen, Sweeney Todd is new on DVD, My Blueberry Nights is in the Limited Release Spotlight, and Batman trivia!
item.itunes:keywords: Leatherheads, Shine A Light, Sweeney Todd, My Blueberry Nights

item.itunes:summary: Meet The Browns and Drillbit Taylor open on the big screen, Enchanted and Atonement are new on DVD, Under The Same Moon is in the Limited Release Spotlight, and Golden Globes trivia!
item.itunes:keywords: Meet The Browns, Drillbit Taylor, Enchanted, Atonement, Under The Same Moon
